segments.text: Is this the right counter to check in for this flight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I have a look at your ticket ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are . I have just come from downtown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry.sir.Your plane has just taken off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? What can I do now ? I can't miss the important meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so sorry to hear that . Maybe you should go to the information counter over there . They can give you some advice .
segments.speaker: S2
